notes: No need to install Python and add PATH to variable to execute on console and it is a backup in case new console failed.
Now = and == both are working as equal signs.
Fixed using character instead of caractere.
Now you can activate or deactivate input messages when using the console
Syntax checker now has been enhanced error detection in for loops(Pour).
Printing now has been enhanced for printing high-quality algorithms
Minor updates to design and UX.
